name: damp

effect.sword_shield: While this Pokémon is in battle, self destruct and explosion will fail and aftermath will not take effect.
effect.the_isle_of_armor: While this Pokémon is in battle, self destruct and explosion will fail and aftermath will not take effect.
effect.the_crown_tundra: While this Pokémon is in battle, self destruct and explosion will fail and aftermath will not take effect.
effect.brilliant_diamond_and_shining_pearl: While this Pokémon is in battle, self destruct and explosion will fail and aftermath will not take effect.
effect.legends_arceus: While this Pokémon is in battle, self destruct and explosion will fail and aftermath will not take effect.

short_effect: Prevents self destruct, explosion, and aftermath from working while the Pokémon is in battle.

flavor_text.sword_shield: Prevents the use of explosive moves, such as Self-Destruct, by dampening its surroundings.
